appDesc.message: Start fast-forwarding playback of call records in your Bitrix24.

headText.message: To use the application, log into your Bitrix24

listItem1Text.message: Open a deal/lead/contact/company, containing a call record

listItem2Text.message: Press the ▸, “X1” sign will appear on the right side of the call recording timeline

listItem3Text.message: Click on the “X1” sign, various values of playback speed will appear in a drop-down menu.

listItem4Text.message: Select required speed with a mouse click

footerText.message:
BITROID - your system integrator.
More interesting solutions for your Bitrix24 on our website.
